questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive on a mysterious island governed by strict time rules and encounter the Foxy Pirates. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc is set on an island under the sea, where the Straw Hat Pirates learn about the history of the Fish-Man race. What is...?
This ability, seen in the Wano arc, allows the user to transform into an ancient dragon. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Kaido's Dragon

questions.question: This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This revolutionary is known for his crow zone ability and efforts to overthrow the World Government. Who is...?
This character is known for their alias 'O-Nami' and their ability to manipulate weather, often seen with a weapon called the 'Clima-Tact'. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
